Title: Chad & Nicole
Plot: Chad, a rock musician, is plagued with performing rituals that take up most of his waking hours. He fears that if he doesn't perform his rituals correctly, something terrible will happen to him or his family. Nicole is obsessed with thoughts of her daughter getting kidnapped or dying. Chad and Nicole hope to overcome their overwhelming fears through Cognitive Behavioral Therapy.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
